org.jooby

Interface ParamConverter.Context

  • Enclosing interface:
    ParamConverter

    public static interface ParamConverter.Context
    Param execution context. Provides access to the conversion service thought the convert(TypeLiteral, Object[]) method. But also let you access to request/app services.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      • convert

        Object convert(com.google.inject.TypeLiteral<?> type,
               Object[] values)
        throws Exception
        Ask to the next convert to resolve a type.
        Parameters:
        type - A type to resolve.
        values - Raw values. Types is one of two: String or Upload.
        Returns:
        A converted value.
        Throws:
        Exception - If conversion fails.
